text:
Jordan James Sinnott (14 February 1994 – 25 January 2020) was an English footballer. He played as a midfielder. His father, Lee Sinnott, captained Huddersfield Town.
Sinnott was born in Bradford, West Yorkshire. His professional career lasted from 2012 until his death in 2020. He played for Huddersfield Town, Altrincham, Bury, Halifax Town, Chesterfield, Alfreton Town and Matlock Town during his career.
On 25 January 2020, Sinnott was found beaten in Retford, Nottinghamshire. He died later that day at the age of 25.
